about: Creating games goes beyond entertainment, it's an art form that evokes emotions on a profound level, similar to how a music instrument conveys feelings through its vibrations...

In game development we orchestrate a symphony of sensory experiences in which every element, texture, character's animation, carries a part of us that forms a deeper connection with players, those connections acts as a bridge that unites people from all corners of the world under an alternate realm, even when the game fades away on time, conveyed emotions remain eternally alive...
All of this should drive us forward and higher, despite the challenges we face in our careers, i fermally think that every effort, sleepless night, and sacrifice we make is worth it.

Game development holds also immense responsibility, with the power to shape experiences and influence players' lives, we must prioritize ethics, inclusivity, and well being shaping a positive and meaningful gaming landscape.

experience.description: Solo Development and publishment of Android Game Red Shift, I learned to design an engagin gameplay, build interactive environments, implement game logic with C#, manage resources, optimize performace, troubleshoot bugs, and create imersive experiences with sound, graphics, animations, etcs...
